Reviews.Content: excellent location tram line topkapi agia sophia galata bridge easy walking distance plenty shops eating drinking close bit shabby plug sockets hanging strange smells noise night expect main street city breakfast ok nice breads sign roof terrace referred reviews breakfast served dingy windowless basement
